text.0: still in vaiśvānaras grace may we continue yea he is king supreme oer all things living.
text.1: sprung hence to life upon this all he looketh vaiśvānara hath rivalry with sūrya.
text.2: present in heaven in earth allpresent agniall plants that grow on ground hath he pervaded.
text.3: may agni may vaiśvānara with vigour present preserve us day and night from foemen.
text.4: be this thy truth vaiśvānara to usward let wealth in rich abundance gather round us.
text.5: this prayer of ours may varuṇa grant and mitra and aditi and sindhu earth and heaven.
